places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Serena
address: Raghunathpur, Near B.M High School, B.T Park, Balurghat Dakshin Dinajpur, West Dinajpur, Balurghat, West Bengal 733101, India

reviews.text: It is a very cozy hotel. The staff are very polite and helpful. Breakfast is complimentary.  The food is absolutely light and delicious,  they seem to have everything on menu and not once were my sister and me told that something on menu isn't available.  The geyser is always available. The room had a.c as well as safe fans with lights. Clean and quiet rooms made our work week pleasant as well as relaxed.

Built outside of the town but experince was good. They have good rooms, staffs are well behaved. And even though located in a small place they have included breakfast service with room. Rooms are good and well maintained.
The place needs to be renovated because it clearly had everything but has not been taken care of properly.

Location is at best.
Luxury Rooms at reasonable Prices and Great Services.
Staffs are so helpful and well trained and gives you great service.

Overall Value for money and it's worth it.
This hotel is very well, the staff and facilities are well at a  reasonable price.  Restaurant also available, complimentary services available here.

places_with_reviews.name: Balurghat Hotel KOKORO Farmhouse
address: Dakbanglo Para, near Natyamandir, Chakbhabani, Balurghat, West Bengal 733101, India

reviews.text: Nestled amidst the serene countryside, KOKORO Hotel offers a sublime retreat that seamlessly blends the charm of a farmhouse with the comforts of a luxury hotel. From the moment you arrive, you're enveloped in a sense of tranquility and warmth that sets the tone for a truly rejuvenating stay.The rustic yet elegant ambiance of KOKORO Hotel evokes a feeling of being far removed from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The lush green surroundings, fragrant gardens, and picturesque views create a peaceful sanctuary that invites guests to unwind and reconnect with nature.

I was in Balurghat for work, and I never expected to find such a good hotel in the middle of the city. I am very much impressed by the greenery and the beautiful flower garden here! More importantly, it is inexpensive, and every important office is within walking distance.

In comparison with any other hotel in Balurghat, I think this hotel has the best location, the best ambiance, and the best services. It caters to the individual needs and requirements of each guest. They provide services designed to meet the needs of all types of guests. As a guest, I enjoyed the hotel's personal touches, such as cooking whatever I wanted. They offered me very home-like meals to me. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. It was nice to see decorations in the rooms. KOKORO hotel offered me WiFi, hot water, housekeeping services, and a bicycle for transportation. Located in the city center, the hotel is within walking distance of all educational institutions.

Having stayed at Kokoro Farmhouse, I am confident its ambiance will make you happy. The place is amazing.Here you can heal your mind, especially if you work in a private company. There is a large garden at Kokoro farmhouse with tropical plants, exotic birds, a miniature pond and colorful aquarium fish. For me, this garden is the most attractive place. There isn't much to see or do in Balurghat after work. The purpose of my visit to Balurghat is to monitor the office systems. In general, we are done with our work by 6 p.m. I spent my free time in the Garden of Kokoro Farmhouse after work instead of going anywhere else in Balurghat. The caretaker didi was very nice . As often as I wanted, she served me milk tea. Just sitting in the garden and spending time there made me feel so relaxed. There is no alternative accommodation like this in Balurghat. I have visited this place more than 5 times. Staying at Kokoro Farmhouse will heal your mind and soul. I would recommend this hotel to all business travelers in Balurghat.

Very good hotel. Very beautiful , clean and spacious . you can feel home like environment here . The food quality is very good and very hygienic. Wherever I come to Balurghat  for my job I stay at Kokoro farmhouse. I have not found any other hotel like Kokoro farmhouse in Balurghat . You can close your eyes and stay here . You will love the Kokoro farmhouse, I bet .

places_with_reviews.name: Lodge Lila
address: Kamarpara - Balurghat Rd, Balurghat, West Bengal 733101, India

reviews.text: I stayed here almost about 15 days... service is too good...but food is not up to the mark...
Hotel have good potential but the rooms are small and not complementary breakfast. Need little professionalism to run hotel business. Otherwise staffs are good and decent.

Day to day service drastically changed
Inside room all plug charges are broken even after request no improvement or change.

Some basic features or facilities also not available like fan, Maintenance AC or geyser .

Some time hot water is also not available.

Always ask full payment before check out where ever 2 days or 3 days.

Choose this hotel for most WORST experience of your life,  The Owner & his staff's are extra ordinary stupid and they running a hotel with fake commitments.
AC , TV , Charging Points, they all reject your request while you try to switch on them all.

Nice hotel to stay & one of the best in Balurghat.
Very nice location.
Near to both Public & State bus stand.
Caring staffs & very punctual in service

The reason of not giving full point is, the lodge is bit old. And the culture of keeping bust-bin out of the room, creates a messy look outside at evening and stays whole night.

places_with_reviews.name: Atreyee Lodge & Hotel
address: 6QHG+9F6, near Railway Reservation counter, Chakbhabani, Balurghat, West Bengal 733101, India

reviews.text: I have no experience to stay here, but as I informed by others and knowing it's location personally I , giving you some information . It's location is very very convenient for whom those who come to Balurghat for official visit . Administrative H.Q. , Police H.Q . District court, SDO office, SBI and other Banks and financial office, College , School ,  Museum, Market all are in walking distance . It is located adjacent to Balurghat Police Station. The Railway station is about 2 K.M. from hear.   You can avail good transport facility from this point .
Zero star stay. Small room without windows. Lots of mosquitoes. Low quality beds and bathroom.  Bedsheets are Not clean at all. Wifi also not free. Don't stay here

Location is good but Very bad experience.  We checked in at the hotel and entered the room no. 106, but could not find the room clean. They did not provide us soap shampoo, although they promised.  Their service was too bad, number of staff was very low, no one could be found half of the time.  Even the AC remote, dustbin and towel had to be brought from the reception by self. Even  1 day out of 3 days, they did not clean the room, did not empty the dustbin. The flush of the commode did not work properly, sometimes the water did not come and sometimes it did not stop.  There was no latch on the main door of the room, either it had to be kept open or it had to be locked, lock was also a problem.  If you locked it from inside the room, it would not be open, the key would be stuck.  Even the bell switch to call someone for help from the room was damaged or the line was cut.  The night bulb was also damaged. They did not change it even after telling them.  The bathroom was very small, standing inside was difficult to open the door.  And the worst thing was the bed, even if I sat on the bed for a while, it seemed as if it would break immediately and at the same time there are always ugly and annoying sounds.

Good Spacious And Cheap Rooms Available here . Quality of food is also up to the standard. Located on a prime spot and services rendered are as good as expectations.
Recommended for room , food and important location.
Good rooms, affordable price, Working AC, Need some maintenance in Bathroom. Overall, Good for family and friends.

places_with_reviews.name: Bjp More
address: Hili Balurghat Hwy, Mangalpur, Balurghat, West Bengal 733101, India

reviews.text: Mostly popular place for hangout during evening time and also popular for commercial involvments like Hyndai & Tata showrooms, Auto Garrages and most importantly OFF SHOP is also available there along with some snack/food stalls around..
Swimming pool of balurghat municipality

Its a very old more of balurghat and as there is an Old BJP office from very beginning so the more is known as BJP more.it is thinly crowded nearby many garages are present.Near to TECHNO INDIA school and THE DAV ATREYEE ENGLISH MEDIUM SCHOOL.its a very proper stop at mongalpur balurghat and is on the way to Balurghat HILI road.the Bangladesh border.......

Its a very old more of balurghat and as there is an Old BJP office from very beginning so the more is known as BJP more.it is thinly crowded nearby many garages are present.Near to TECHNO INDIA school and THE DAV ATREYEE ENGLISH MEDIUM SCHOOL.its a very proper stop at mongalpur balurghat and is on the way to Balurghat HILI road.the Bangladesh border.......

The name BJP More is a bit misleading. It has no truck with the political party by the same name. At least not any more. It's a non descript place that has a petrol pump, apartments, regular shops, motor garages, and a few schools along the State Highway. Most political parties choose this More (pronounced मोड़ in Hindi. English pronunciation of more is a little awkward though and comes closer to "garh" as in Ramgarh, so "morh" may be a better option for those foreign to Bengali or Hindi pronunciation of Bengali "more") to initiate their processions. This place can be accessed from Hili More as well as Subhas Corner,from North and East respectively.
Good oil is given .but its better if they had the premium petrol.place is nice for food and marketing.many shop are  available for marketing here.
